sentences.en: Common units of volume are cubic centimeter.
sentences.cn: 常见的体积单位是立方厘米.

sentences.en: Human brains have more than 100 million cells per cubic centimeter.
sentences.cn: 人脑每立方厘米有一亿多个细胞.

sentences.en: Jupiter'smoon Io, whose density is 3.5 grams per cubic centimetre, is all rock.
sentences.cn: 密度为每立方厘米3.5克的木星卫星木卫一上遍布岩石。

sentences.en: Nothing was your own except the few cubic centimetres inside your skull.
sentences.cn: 一切的一切,再也不属于你啦——除去脑壳里区区几立方厘米的空间,那还算得上你的领地.

sentences.en: The average flow of the river is 200 cubic metres per second.
sentences.cn: 这条河平均流量为每秒二百立方米.

sentences.en: The capacity of the mixing cask is about forty - one cubic feet.
sentences.cn: 混合箱的容积约等于41立方英尺.

sentences.en: the cubic capacity of an engine
The pure compound tends to crystallize systematically into cubic form.
sentences.cn: 纯化合物倾向于系统地结晶成立方形状.

sentences.en: The reservoir has in storage about 30 million cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这座水库贮水约3000万立方米.

sentences.en: The reservoir has in storage about five million cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这水库有五百万立方米的储存量.

sentences.en: The volume of this container is 1000 cubic feet.
sentences.cn: 该容器的容积是一千立方英尺.

sentences.en: The volume of this container is 1000 cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这个集装箱的容量是1000立方米.

sentences.en: The volume of this container is 2 cubic meters.
sentences.cn: 这个容器的容量是两立方米.

sentences.en: The volume of this large box is 3 cubic metres.
sentences.cn: 这个大箱子的容积是三立方米.

sentences.en: The whole dam bulks about 4,400,000 cubic yards.
sentences.cn: 整个坝总计约达4,400,000立方码.

sentences.en: We need 3 cubic yards of sand.
sentences.cn: 我们需要3立方码的沙子.

words.tran_cn: [数] 立方的；立方体的；体积的
[数] 长方体；[解剖] 骰骨
使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积

phrases.tran_cn: 立方晶格；立方格子；立方点阵
三次多项式；立方次多项式
三次样条；三次样条曲线（线图）；三次仿样函数

trans.tran_en: relating to a measurement of space which is calculated by multiplying the length of something by its width and height
